ComicInfo.Title: Black Light District, Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s on! Hang on to your wigs and keys, citizens—here comes the no-holds-barred brawl between Dredd and Judge Death you’ve been waiting for… and this bloody you-know-what match will leave both changed forever!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | David Stoupakis | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | John Charles | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:20:22. [CVDB468105]
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Griffin, Chief Judge McGruder, Judge Anderson, Judge Death, Judge Dredd, Judge Fear, Judge Fire, Judge Mortis, Judge Omar
ComicInfo.Teams: Council of Five, Dark Judges, Judges of Mega-City One
ComicInfo.Locations: Earth, Mega-City One, North America, Sector One, Space, Titan
